Our Membership is currently divided into four sections.

The High Council is responsible for most of the decision making and runs under a majority vote. The Leader of the High Council is determined by the rest of the Council, and that person is the official Guild Leader. However, everyone in the High Council is to be considered a leader in their own right.

The Exodus Honor Guard is a tier of Honored Officers. They have full Officer powers and are expected to do their utmost to maintain their integrity and loyalty to our Fellowship.

The Hall of Ages is the Offical post for former High Council members to reside, and continue to help the guild beyond their decision making days. Just as these people were respected for their decision making abilities and recruiting abilities while in the High Council, they so will in this post. Their job is to inform the High Council on how they feel on an issue that troubles the Council, sort of a secondary source or view, and they shall be granted the tenure for recruiting. From hence forward, all members of the Hall of Ages will be titled Sage. In part this post is to prevent former leaders of the guild from disappearing from view, so we can continue to pick on them, and pass around ale.

The Fellowship consists of our largest group. They are expected to obey all of our guild's bylaws as well as encouraged to actively participate in guild functions. Our membership is made up of the finest and friendliest people Norrath and Luclin has to offer, and are at all times to be treated with the same respect that you would give an Officer.
All members are expected to sign up with Guild Magic. This free service allows us to keep track of all of our members and each person is responsible for updating their own stats. Just go to their homepage, create a Username and Password, enter your characters and select Exodus Fellowship as your guild. Guild Magic is located at...
Once you have done that, the Guild Administrator will receive an email notification that you wish to be accepted into the Exodus Fellowship. Once the administrator accepts you into the guild you and your alts will be listed in the Roster. You may also attach a picture of yourself to your Guild Magic character page. For information on how to do that, or to view several of our member's biography pages, please head to...
For a step by step guide on how to register with Guild Magic, please click

EQ Druids
3. Guild vault items. If you receive an item from the vault – please pass it on to another Exodus Guildie or return it to Bagaloot when you are through with it.
2. You are entitled to our tradeskills special. Namely out tradeskillers will make an attempt at an item if you come to them with ALL of the components necessary to make that item. Example: You bring Ursi a hq bear pelt and pattern and she makes an attempt at creating a 10 slot 10% weight reduction backpack. We are not responsible if you lose your ingredients in a failed attempt.

4. If you have an issue or complaint with another member of this guild, please keep accusatory remarks off of our message board. You may contact the entire High Council by writing to Complaints@ExodusFellowship.com. Separate Officer and Member emails are located at the top of the Info & Help links at the top right of this page. Please feel free to use them
